description: '''Lloyd Woodrowe James'''  (born 26 October 1947), better known as '''Prince Jammy''' or '''King Jammy''', is a Jamaican [[Dub music|dub]] mixer, [[Sound system (Jamaican)|sound system]] owner and record producer. He began his musical career as a dub master at [[King Tubby]]'s recording studio. His dubs are known for their clear sound and use of effects.
